reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 641/94: ZONING AREAS - UNORGANIZED TERRITORIES OF LAKE OF THE WOODS, TERRITORIAL DISTRICT OF KENORA
reg_info.reg_name_text: ZONING AREAS — UNORGANIZED TERRITORIES OF LAKE OF THE WOODS, TERRITORIAL DISTRICT OF KENORA
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 641/94: ZONING AREAS - UNORGANIZED TERRITORIES OF LAKE OF THE WOODS, TERRITORIAL DISTRICT OF KENORA
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. In this Order,  “accessory”, when used to describe a use, building or structure, means a use, building or structure that is normally incidental or subordinate to the principal use, building or structure on the same lot; “dwelling unit” means one or more habitable rooms occupied or capable of being occupied as an independent and separate housekeeping establishment in which separate kitchen and sanitary facilities are provided for the exclusive use of the occupants; “lot” means a parcel of land shown as a lot on a plan registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23); “seasonal dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit used for recreation and not occupied as a permanent residence; “single dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit occupied or capable of being occupied as a permanent residence. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Order,

“accessory”, when used to describe a use, building or structure, means a use, building or structure that is normally incidental or subordinate to the principal use, building or structure on the same lot;

“dwelling unit” means one or more habitable rooms occupied or capable of being occupied as an independent and separate housekeeping establishment in which separate kitchen and sanitary facilities are provided for the exclusive use of the occupants;

“lot” means a parcel of land shown as a lot on a plan registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23);

“seasonal dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit used for recreation and not occupied as a permanent residence;

“single dwelling” means a building containing only one dwelling unit occupied or capable of being occupied as a permanent residence. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 1.

content.content: 2. This Order applies to that parcel of land on Hare Island in the unorganized territories of Lake of the Woods, in the Territorial District of Kenora, composed of all of Location G-1541, Hare Island, described as Lots 1-11, inclusive, and Block 12, on Plan 23M-897 registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23). O. Reg. 641/94, s. 2. General
content.raw_html:
2. This Order applies to that parcel of land on Hare Island in the unorganized territories of Lake of the Woods, in the Territorial District of Kenora, composed of all of Location G-1541, Hare Island, described as Lots 1-11, inclusive, and Block 12, on Plan 23M-897 registered in the Land Registry Office for the Land Titles Division of Kenora (No. 23). O. Reg. 641/94, s. 2.

General

content.content: 3. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lot 1 on Plan 23M-897 except one single dwelling existing on the date this section comes into force and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a single dwelling. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lot 1 on Plan 23M-897 except one single dwelling existing on the date this section comes into force and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a single dwelling. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 3.

content.content: 4. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lots 2 to 11 on Plan 23M-897 except one seasonal dwelling for each lot and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a seasonal dwelling. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Lots 2 to 11 on Plan 23M-897 except one seasonal dwelling for each lot and uses, buildings and structures accessory to a seasonal dwelling. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 4.

content.content: 5. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Block 12 on Plan 23M-897 except uses for the purpose of private or public recreation including parks, playing fields, playgrounds and conservation areas. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. Every use of land and every erection, location or use of buildings or structures is prohibited on Block 12 on Plan 23M-897 except uses for the purpose of private or public recreation including parks, playing fields, playgrounds and conservation areas. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 5.

content.content: 6. No land to which this Order applies shall hereafter be used and no building or structure shall hereafter be erected or used except in accordance with the terms of this Order but nothing in this Order prevents the use of any land, building or structure for a purpose prohibited by this Order if the land, building or structure is lawfully used for such purpose on the day this Order comes into force. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 6. Rebuilding and Repairs
content.raw_html:
6. No land to which this Order applies shall hereafter be used and no building or structure shall hereafter be erected or used except in accordance with the terms of this Order but nothing in this Order prevents the use of any land, building or structure for a purpose prohibited by this Order if the land, building or structure is lawfully used for such purpose on the day this Order comes into force. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 6.

Rebuilding and Repairs

content.content: 7. (1) Nothing in this Order prevents the reconstruction of any building or structure that is damaged or destroyed by causes beyond the control of the owner if the dimensions of the original building or structure are not increased or its original use altered. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 7 (1). (2) Nothing in this Order prevents the strengthening or restoration to a safe condition of any building or structure or part of any such building or structure. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 7 (2).
content.raw_html:
7. (1) Nothing in this Order prevents the reconstruction of any building or structure that is damaged or destroyed by causes beyond the control of the owner if the dimensions of the original building or structure are not increased or its original use altered. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 7 (1).

(2) Nothing in this Order prevents the strengthening or restoration to a safe condition of any building or structure or part of any such building or structure. O. Reg. 641/94, s. 7 (2).
